message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60 and you take 40.
Let's try a bit more balanced split, 55 for me and 45 for you.
The value is decreasing, Bob.  Let's stick with my original offer - it's a good deal for both of us.
You didn't budge, so I'll try a bit higher. 57 for me, 43 for you.
Time is running out, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit.  This is a fair offer.
You barely moved, so I'll try a bit higher again. 58 for me, 42 for you. Time is running out for you too.
